data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who are far from you in Janub Sina'. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Janub Sina‘, Egypt
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Janub Sina' with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Janub Sina' to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, help the 7,321 believers in Janub Sina' to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 157,279 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, I pray that the Adyghe people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Adyghe people know you.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Janub Sina'.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Janub Sina' to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Janub Sina‘, Egypt.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
